verses.name: 1 Kings 18:14
verses.text: And now thou sayest, Go, tell thy lord, Behold, Elijah is here: and he shall slay me.

verses.name: 1 Kings 18:15
verses.text: And Elijah said, As the Lord of hosts liveth, before whom I stand, I will surely shew myself unto him to day.

verses.name: 1 Kings 18:16
verses.text: So Obadiah went to meet Ahab, and told him: and Ahab went to meet Elijah.

verses.name: 1 Kings 18:17
verses.text: And it came to pass, when Ahab saw Elijah, that Ahab said unto him, Art thou he that troubleth Israel?
